attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
AS THE PRIME MINSTER HAS SAID ON GMTV HE WOULD BE PREPARED TO CONSIDER A NEW PUBLIC HOLIDAY CONCERNING VETERANS AFFAIRS.
COULD I SUGGEST THE IDEAL DATE 11TH NOVEMBER.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
